Title: â­[ANN][PRE-SALE]ğŸ”¥BX.BET - The decentralized betting exchangeğŸ”¥ â­
Body: Hello tuansemazi,  In fact the BX ecosystem differs a lot from all other blockchain competitors! I will point out the most relevant differences.  First of all BX is a fully decentralized peer-to-peer betting exchange, meaning its players do not bet against a centralized bookmaker at the end (advantages: no limitations for players, total transparency by removing the bookmaker, improved odds, lower fees, reduced operating costs). Basically the whole content of the ecosystem will be created, handled and voted by the community. The system automatically creates smart contracts for every step in the betting process, which makes it very secure at the same time. We have a great innovative superuser / market owner concept, that allows users to take over the role as a bookmaker and to earn extra BX tokens! In general, there is a lot of community engagement, which will contribute to a great social betting experience.  Furthermore BX will not focus on sports betting only. Financial and prediction markets will be the other 2 big pillars in the ecosystem. In prediction markets you can basically bet on anything! It's a very interesting and upcoming market. Also there are public and private betting markets. Private betting markets are only accessible via invitation and are great for closed groups as friends, colleagues, small betting communities, etc.!  There are many features that will make BX very unique and also extremely attractive for the giant betting market. Please take a look at the competitor analysis below. You can also find this in our well worked-out Whitepaper.

Title: â­[ANN][PRE-SALE]ğŸ”¥BX.BET - The decentralized betting exchangeğŸ”¥ â­
Body: Hello Dargin,  many thanks for your question. In fact the BX ecosystem differs a lot from all other blockchain competitors! Let me point out the most relevant differences.  First of all BX is a fully decentralized peer-to-peer betting exchange, meaning its players do not bet against a centralized bookmaker at the end (advantages: no limitations for players, total transparency by removing the bookmaker, improved odds, lower fees, reduced operating costs). Basically the whole content of the ecosystem will be created, handled and voted by the community. The system automatically creates smart contracts for every step in the betting process, which makes it very secure at the same time. We have a great innovative superuser / market owner concept, that allows users to take over the role as a bookmaker and to earn extra BX tokens! In general, there is a lot of community engagement, which will contribute to a great social betting experience.  Furthermore BX will not focus on sports betting only. Financial and prediction markets will be the other 2 big pillars in the ecosystem. In prediction markets you can basically bet on anything! It's a very interesting and upcoming market. Also there are public and private betting markets. Private betting markets are only accessible via invitation and are great for closed groups as friends, colleagues, small betting communities, etc.!  There are many features that will make BX very unique and also extremely attractive for the giant betting market. Please take a look at the competitor analysis below. You can also find this in our well worked-out Whitepaper.     Let me know if there are further questions. Also please be invited to our Telegram group to get some good discussions around BX.

Body: Hi Ectoplasm,  this is an important point. In a decentralized ecosystem, where users can create own betting markets, it's obviously very important to have a strong anit-spam and -fraud protection system. On BX.BET we developed a process, that keeps spam and joke markets to a minimum. Every market creator is required to provide a small deposit when creating a public betting market. In a second step public betting markets need to be approved by the community, before going live. We therefore have a separate category "new markets", in where the community can vote for an approval. If the new market achieves a certain amount of positive votes, the approval process is finished and the market is available to the public. In this case the BX smart contract will automatically refund the deposit back to the market creator. Furthermore he will also receive a share of all betting activities, which is the main incentive for users to create new markets.  Please see the abstract below.
